title: Clerical Aid Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Madison Area Technical College (Madison, WI) in Jul 2022
Interview Descriptions:
Video interview with 3 interviewers, they went around and asked 9 questions total, one by one. You're also given the questions 30 minutes before the interview to prepare. 

The 3rd person definitely did not want to be there, wearing just a t-shirt and barely written anything down, it was quiet uncomfortable to consider I may have ended up working with someone who doesn't care about the position or who they are interviewing. The other two interviewers were awesome and very welcoming though.
Interview Questions:
How do you prioritize and manage your time? 
Please describe your experience using enterprise software solutions.

title: Student Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Madison Area Technical College
Interview Descriptions: A nice interview that was not intimidating at all. I was made to feel welcomed. They really emphasized what they were looking for and seemed to really value my questions.

title: HR Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Madison Area Technical College
Interview Descriptions: There was a pre-interview assignment 30 minutes before the interview. The interview itself was about 30-40 minutes. The interview was with a panel of 3 people. Then there was a post interview assignment with a 45 minute time limit.
Interview Questions: How would you support diversity and inclusion? How do you stay compliant?

title: Student Tutor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Madison Area Technical College (Madison, WI) in Mar 2021
Interview Descriptions: You will meet with the person in charge of all the tutors at Madison College. He will ask about your prior experience working with other students, children, adults, etc. The primary focus is whether you have had experience teaching and how excited you are.
Interview Questions: What is your prior experience working in a team?

title: Sociology Instructor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Madison Area Technical College (Madison, WI)
Interview Descriptions: 3 rounds:  (1) one-hour interview with 3 faculty + assistant dean, with 15-minute teaching demonstration to committee; (2) 45-minute teaching demonstration in front of an actual class and one-hour interview with same 3 faculty + dean; (3) interview with the provost. Then, there is a background check and reference check (after you have been selected as the final candidate).
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work at Madison College--and not a university?

title: Student Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Madison Area Technical College (Madison, WI) in Apr 2019
Interview Descriptions: An in person interview by 2 of the senior staff members asking you various questions related to your experience in IT as well as your ability to lift heavy objects.
Interview Questions: How are experienced are you when it comes to IT.

title: Lab Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Madison Area Technical College in Jul 2018
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview with several department heads arranged by an HR rep.  Followed up by an in person group and individual with direct supervisors and department heads also arranged by HR contact
Interview Questions: Phone interview followed the typical STAR interview questions

title: Academic Success Coach - TRiO Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Madison Area Technical College in May 2017
Interview Descriptions: Laid back interview process. You are provided with a sheet of interview questions and you go through each question. The interviewers will be writing highlights of your responses for comparison to other candidates. No questions were unexpected.
Interview Questions: What experience do you have working with diverse/first generation/income eligible populations?

title: Director of Human Resources Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Madison Area Technical College (South Madison, WI) in Jan 2017
Interview Descriptions: Dull, room smelt like a giant fart, and BO coming off committee persons, the smell was very pungent almost like the smell of fresh vomit. If only I had brought some Febreze.
Interview Questions: How to retaliate and be a demeaning person.

title: Part-time Program Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Madison Area Technical College (Madison, WI) in Mar 2016
Interview Descriptions:
I was interviewed by four people in the Adult and Continuing Education department. Although the job description breakdown listed data entry, it was supposedly only a tiny part of the role.

When asked which part of the role I'd find the most challenging, I said "data entry." The interviewers emphasized that all I'd be doing was data entry.

title: Pt Instructor Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at Madison Area Technical College (Madison, WI) in Aug 2014
Interview Descriptions: Had to meet requirements stated on job application.  One of these were to gather employment information (hours, dates, and job duties) from prior employers.  Also to have formal transcripts sent to administration for approval to hire.
Interview Questions: How would you handle a student that is being blatantly rude or obnoxious in class?

title: Lab Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Madison Area Technical College (Madison, WI) in Apr 2013
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was casual and conversational. The standard interview questions are replaced by more personal questions, allowing the interviewer to get a better idea of what kind of person you are.
Interview Questions: What made me want to apply for the position?

title: Math Tutor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Madison Area Technical College (Madison, WI) in Feb 2013
Interview Descriptions: First you apply online. They ask for you to watch a very straightforward powerpoint and fill out forms. The actual interview was one on one with a very nice employer. There were no trick question or skills portion. If you are qualified to tutor, the job is not difficult to get.

title: Dean Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Madison Area Technical College (Madison, WI) in Feb 2008
Interview Descriptions: Met with committee, a faculty staff forum, and vice president. No presentations required at that time.
Interview Questions: Questions were fair and expected.  Nothing difficult or unexpected in the hiring process.
